text: María Elena Holly (née Santiago; born December 20, 1932) is a Puerto Rican businesswoman. She is the widow of American rock and roll legend Buddy Holly. She owns the rights to his name, image, trademarks, and other property. In 2010, Santiago-Holly co-founded the Buddy Holly Educational Foundation. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:People from San Juan, Puerto Rico Category:Puerto Rican businesspeople
title: María Elena Holly
